query:
ALTER TABLE cases 
ADD COLUMN clientAddress TEXT AFTER clientPhone,
ADD COLUMN businessName VARCHAR(255) AFTER clientAddress,
ADD COLUMN entityType VARCHAR(50) AFTER businessName,
ADD COLUMN websiteUrl TEXT AFTER entityType,
ADD COLUMN instagramUrl TEXT AFTER websiteUrl,
ADD COLUMN tiktokUrl TEXT AFTER instagramUrl,
ADD COLUMN facebookUrl TEXT AFTER tiktokUrl,
ADD COLUMN youtubeUrl TEXT AFTER facebookUrl,
ADD COLUMN linkInBio TEXT AFTER youtubeUrl,
ADD COLUMN primaryGoal VARCHAR(100) AFTER linkInBio,
ADD COLUMN targetAuthority TEXT AFTER primaryGoal,
ADD COLUMN stage VARCHAR(100) AFTER targetAuthority,
ADD COLUMN estimatedAmount VARCHAR(50) AFTER stage,
ADD COLUMN deadline VARCHAR(50) AFTER estimatedAmount;
